Previous studies using wild-type Encephalomyocarditis virus (EMCV) and Mengo virus, and variants of these viruses being able to be genetically engineered to substitute or truncate the poly(C) tracts have produced conflicting data on the role of the poly(C) tract in the virulence of these viruses.
example.arg: wild-type Encephalomyocarditis virus (EMCV) and Mengo virus, and variants of these viruses
